= Installation =

{{{
mkdir -p /root/software
cd /root/software
wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.0.12.tar.gz
tar zxvf nginx-1.0.12.tar.gz
cd nginx-1.0.12
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/nginx --with-http_stub_status_module --with-http_ssl_module
make
make install
}}}
